title: Best of The Herd for Jul 20, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 20, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin.


Don't listen to the noise, there will be a NFL season

Rob Gronkowski wanting a change

MLB without fans in stadiums.


Guest: Senior NFL reporter for MMQB Albert Breer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
